message.body: I will not be able to attend.
Tks! See ya tomorrow!
Might you be at Transmission this evening? I need to retrieve my bass.
There now.... I can maybe meetcha? What time?
Where you at?
Oh, and when you leave, punch in code and then open door & lock both behind ya (if someone else is there, no need to enter code when leaving). Thx!
Still at Dos?
Yea!
Good. Be there with a few in about 20 minutes.
Yay!
Have un great time!
Gracias!!!
Heya! Hope yr alright... Just saw crazy fb posts about the po'po...
I need to be home right now. I will see you all on Sunday.
No prob, wasn't sure who was coming so just mass txted
On monday the 29th, are we meeting before the preview? if not before, what time are we meeting?
We are....not sure the time, twixt 2 and 6
Got it. Where is Jeremy now?
Dunno...at home? Maybe?
Ok
Are you at Tranny?
Yes
Who's making music?
And his #, please.
Gotcha. If the EL is indeed running, I won't need a ride. Keep me posted on what's up and I'll see you at noon.
El is indeed running, I called septa, and have seen 2 of them. So I'll tell Sarah and Mel that yr good. See you st noon!
Ok
Love.
And you!
What's the easiest way to obtain a few tickets for the show on Friday? Can they go through me? Is it better for you if they go through the box office? Please
advise.
At door is fine on Friday
Running behind, I'll be at the Hope by 4:30.
If you come party in the West, and have room for it, could you bring a bottle our two of rum? I'll trade you money for it
Thanks!
Call corey! He's at the space with the rum, and could maybe take them to ya! Or at least put west
Out. Not put

Tomorrow night! Rubblebucket, Grandchildren, & Terror Pigeon Dance Revolt @ Blockley(38th & Ludlow). Tickets are $9-12 and starts at 8?? maybe 9??
I've been

/www.theblockley.com/event/56935/
See you tomorrow!! Love your Wild; spread it 'round.

really excited to see this show. There is (as of now) a keg of beer at my place and you're welcomed to come beforehand and assist with its completion.
http:/
Woo, gonna try to make it out!
Is yr man festival thing tonight??
Yes it is. You all coming?
SHOULD WE????
The more the merrier!
Will there be sexy men? Will they touch us...respectfully?
Sure you right! At least I will.

And we laugh...
So...which is better in your opinion?
The first pair if he wants to be malcolm x, the second if not!
No one can say no to Malcolm.
Thank you.
Sure. Just as long a it's returned within a week of it's departure.
Any way jess Conda could borrow yr wireless mic for thurs and friday?
I don't have it. It's at Transmissions on one of the shelves.
Awesome! I will tell her to get in touch witcha!
Oh, sweet
I'm going to a cd release show tonight at Tin Angel for my buddy Brian Seymour. My friend Sarah has offered her place for dinner before the show. Probably ar
ound 7. Interested?
I have beansbeansbeans tech all night :-(. Thanks tho!
Understood. I'll see you at the show.
Nice.
Friday feastday at noras, afternoon times!
What's the word for when something finally makes sense?
Ephemeral?
You and jeremy were saying it last night.
Ha, CRACKED
Cracked!!
I'm cozy, would you be adverse to coming west? Will provide place to play and a movie afterwards. What say ye on such short notice?
K
So tired. Just drove past home and it's too inviting. I'll be out for pick of destiny tomorrow!
What time for movie night?
So, movie night! 8pm is good for gathering. Was thinking of inviting Adam and Robin from Cranes Are Flying; any objections?
Nope! See ya then!
What's yr addresss?
Should we bring something potato like?
Yes!
Games and drinks tonight at me and Sang's place. Let's say 7-8 ish is a good time to show up. See you later?
Maaaybe, have a bday party to go to in cc, so might not, will try!
Coo'
Fuck tots
What?
That was Dave
Sure it was. :0)
Sorry I dropped the ball on party info last night. I went to Elana's but it kinda sucked, so I didn't stay.
Told you there was no party last night!
Did you go to data garden yesterday?
No. I was going to go today, but it's nice out so we're going to do slack lining in the park. Come to West!
Wah, I gotta stay this side, have to be at tranny by 4. Have fun!
You too?
Ha, have fun!
Mogwai?
So apparently they grabbed everything except the pa, couldn't find it. Any idea where it is?
Oh chitty! I can no make it. I will wish you Happy Birthday from afar and will a light show into existence!
Thanks john! I think Sean macphee is going to do it, but if for some reason that doesn't work out, I'll def hit this guy up. Thanks for keepin a lookout!
So you know if anyone can attend the Fringe bar our is it only Fringe players?
Anyone!
Yay !
Sent you an email but you should checkin with Starwood. They're playing shows tomorrow and Saturday, so I'm pretty sure they had the wrong dates.
Scott, the drummer, is having the surgery Friday but the doctor wants to keep him overnight. Once released, he'll be able to play, but that won't be until Satu
rday. It's, unfortunately, a small window that is closed for us. :0(
Oh wow, ok. Keep getting my hopes up :-(
My final comp: Jeff Rousset! I hope this can be done. Thanks!

...I asked that all comps be given a day out. Especially for today...I will try but it may not be possible, I asked them to stop selling when they got to 70 so I would have 13 at the door, but those 13 are already claimed. I think it will work but he will
No need for sorry, that will be just fine. I'm sorry for being late. Thank you.
No worries, we're just bursting at the seems tonight! But we will get everyone in!
Did mindy give you my keys?
Yes, then I gave them to you. Inside when you returned from returning risers.
What's yr addy? Might drop in for troll hunter.
Sorry, band only.
I did not recognize you in your new hair cut.
Of course. See you later.
Iminami movie night! Are you free this Sunday eve? Will try to find a time that works for all.
Hurr
Barbary! Where toy qt?
Going to 2 piece fest?
Well, perhaps I'll see you later!
Nah :-( well...maybe later if I finish stuff here!
I'll letcha know!
Hello and good morning! I'm in need of James'a email. Can you provide?
ostrichteeth@gmail.com in case that didn't work
Thanks doll.
Too late; Robert is sexier!
You gon' love 'em!
Aw. You really can't make that mans Face look bad :-)
